name: Jellumi
description:
An atmospheric adventure game in which your goal is to join your family!

Controls - WASD Movement

Objective - Find your Jelly Kids and reach your Jelly Wife!

Don't let your light fade out! (if you run out of light you will lose)

Find your kids and by them joining you, you will be able to go further!

Recharge your light by activating pearls you find along your journey!

Reach your Jelly Wife and have a happy Jelly Life!
